name: Gravitas (amandanguyen)
description:
Game Description:

Gravitas is a platformer where the player tries to travel up the tower by using the gravity objects to fly across platforms, swing around ledges, and avoid lava!

How to play:

Move - WASD

ESC - Toggle Menu

Toggle Gravity Objects - Up/Down or W/S

Additional Notes:

This game started as a class project and is still in development.  Feel free to leave feedback in the comments!  Thanks!
